urls.title: Water saving tips - Ofwat
urls.description: There are many ways that you can save water around your home. You may find the following tips helpful.

text:
üí¶ The average UK water usage is 143 litres per person per day? The @EnvAgency wants us all to try and reduce this to 110 litres per person per day to help ensure we can meet our future water needs. We can all do our bit by using water more wisely.

üëáhttps://t.co/0BDzxGYCMZ https://t.co/P5gRPYvhmn
